author: Camilo Montoya-Galvez
title: 3 workers at facilities housing migrant kids in U.S. custody test positive for coronavirus
description: A dozen migrant children in U.S. custody have been tested for the virus. Five results came back negative and the rest are pending.
content:
Three staff members at facilities that care for unaccompanied migrant children in U.S. custody, as well as one foster parent, have now tested positive for the coronavirus, federal officials said Monday.
The three staff members work at two different facilitie… [+928 chars]
